name: myHaiku
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des:
My haiku finds some of the poets funniest poems that will have you laughing, or scratching your head and want to hear again, and again. The famous haiku poems can now be enjoyed in all of your Alexa devices.
To hear a poem, just say "Alexa, tell about my haiku poems" or "Alexa, ask haiku for me to read me a poem.". and Alexa will give you a variety of haiku poems to enjoy. Let's get started!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
